alert.note: Alert for Ashland; Bayfield; Douglas (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 15 at 10:00PM CST by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A strong area of thunderstorms will impact portions of Bayfield, Douglas and Ashland Counties through 1045 PM CST... At 958 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking an area of strong thunderstorms 8 miles west of Wascott, or 26 miles north of Spooner, moving north at 55 mph. Automated weather observation stations in Siren and Solon Springs have measured wind gusts between 40 to 50 mph over the last half hour. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Solon Springs around 1010 PM CST. Other locations in the path of this storm include Hawthorne, Poplar and South Range. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
